issue.title: Remove header from image.proto. Remove time from image_stamped.proto

content.raw:
So you propose having 2 versions of most msgs, the non-stamped without a header, and the stamped one with a header? Note that the header is optional, but I'm not sure if that affects anything.

As a side note, I'm sure we're not the only ones using protobuf messages with timestamps, protobuf even provides a [timestamp](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/reference/csharp/class/google/protobuf/well-known-types/timestamp) type. It might be worth it researching how other projects handle the issue of nested timestamps.
content.html:
So you propose having 2 versions of most msgs, the non-stamped without a header, and the stamped one with a header? Note that the header is optional, but I'm not sure if that affects anything.

As a side note, I'm sure we're not the only ones using protobuf messages with timestamps, protobuf even provides a timestamp type. It might be worth it researching how other projects handle the issue of nested timestamps.
